text:
Yes sure. I read up on the git workflow that you linked here and did edit the file. Here is the link to the PR for feedback:
<https://github.com/r-devel/r-svn/pull/103>

P.S. I removed the scale of the function and modified the function, but I also modified the graphical parameters a bit so that they don't get so crowded. Hope I helped...

attachments.fallback: #103 Change in documentation owing to a bug report
attachments.text:
This is a change in documentation, owing to the bug report at <https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=17699|https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=17699>. Changes made:

• modify the function f so that it does not return NAs
• remove the scale of the function f
• modify the expand parameter of persp to better represent the changes in the graph
• modify the z-axis values of trans3d in both points and lines
attachments.title: #103 Change in documentation owing to a bug report
